pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.5: That woman approached Udāyī, bowed, and sat down.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.6: Udāyī then instructed, inspired, and gladdened her with a teaching.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.1^b: Encouraging sexual intercourse to a single woman, etc.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.1: It is a woman, he perceives her as a woman, and he has lust.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.2: If the monk encourages the woman to satisfy his own needs, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.3: It is a woman, but he is unsure of it …

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.7: If the monk encourages the woman to satisfy his own needs, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.8: It is a eunuch, he perceives him as a eunuch, and he has lust.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.9: If the monk encourages the eunuch to satisfy his own needs, he commits a serious offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.10: It is a eunuch, but he is unsure of it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.11: It is a eunuch, but he perceives him as a man …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.12: It is a eunuch, but he perceives him as an animal …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.13: It is a eunuch, but he perceives him as a woman, and he has lust.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.14: If the monk encourages the eunuch to satisfy his own needs, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.17: It is an animal, he perceives it as an animal …

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.20: It is an animal, but he perceives it as a eunuch …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.21: It is an animal, but he perceives it as a man, and he has lust.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.22: If the monk encourages the animal to satisfy his own needs, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.23^a: Encouraging sexual intercourse to two beings of the same kind
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.23: It is two women, he perceives them both as women, and he has lust.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.24: If the monk encourages both women to satisfy his own needs, he commits two offenses entailing suspension.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.26^a: Encouraging sexual intercourse to two beings of a different kind
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.26: It is a woman and a eunuch, he perceives both as women, and he has lust.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.27: If the monk encourages both of them to satisfy his own needs, he commits one offense entailing suspension and one offense of wrong conduct.
